title: Presents
summaries: Presents are grab bag-type items available during Christmas seasonal event. Each contains one random reward from the list below. Presents are opened by pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button on them in the player's inventory, similar to all other grab bags. They can be opened anytime, even outside the Christmas season.
Presents are dropped by any enemy except statue-spawned enemies and Meteor Heads with a 7.69*1/13 (7.69%) chance, during Christmas only.
Presents always appear as blue in the player's inventory. Once placed, the present will appear as a random color.

On the <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the old <linked>[img:Blue Present]</linked> Blue, <linked>[img:Green Present]</linked> Green, and <linked>[img:Yellow Present]</linked> Yellow Presents still exist but they cannot be placed. Initially, Presents dropped from <linked>Present Mimics</linked> could be placed, although they disappeared after placement. They no longer drop, but have not yet been removed from <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>. For more information, see <linked>Present (furniture)</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
[img:Desktop version] Right click to open
[img:Xbox] Press LT to open
[img:PlayStation] Press R1 to open
[img:Wii U] Press ZR to open
[img:Nintendo Switch] Press ZL to open
[img:Mobile version] Double tap to open
[img:Nintendo 3DS version] Tap to open the present!
